content.raw:
I’m running into similar issues with the example setup tutorial [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup)

I checked all software versions and switched to the tunnel\_circuit branch \(will that be made the new default for cloning? Is [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/system\_requirements](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/system_requirements) the only place that mentions that branch?\)

It initially was unable to locate ros1-ign-bridge and attempted to solve with @{557058:1f28259c-05de-48ba-8999-15883e0df24e} 's instructions in #89.

```
cd ~/subt_ws/src
git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git
cd ~/subt_ws
catkin_make install
```

After running `roslaunch subt_example teleop.launch` and `ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1` in separate terminals, I can see the tunnel circuit and the X1 robot in gazebo.

Both `rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel` and `ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay` show nonzero values, but the robot doesn’t move. Additionally, the lights don’t turn on/off. And the /X1/front/image\_raw isn’t being published
content.html:
I’m running into similar issues with the example setup tutorial #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup

I checked all software versions and switched to the tunnel_circuit branch (will that be made the new default for cloning? Is #!/osrf/subt/wiki/system_requirements the only place that mentions that branch?)

It initially was unable to locate ros1-ign-bridge and attempted to solve with @Jon Fink 's instructions in #89.

cd ~/subt_ws/src
git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git
cd ~/subt_ws
catkin_make install

After running roslaunch subt_example teleop.launch and ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 in separate terminals, I can see the tunnel circuit and the X1 robot in gazebo.

Both rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel and ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay show nonzero values, but the robot doesn’t move. Additionally, the lights don’t turn on/off. And the /X1/front/image_raw isn’t being published
